Description:
  A new game from the developer "HorrorGames", released 
after a long hiatus. In this game, you need to support 
the burning of fire, for this you need to look for 
firewood, caches and explore the map in every possible way.  
Control:
F4 - full screen mode 
E - firebox and tree felling 
W A S D - movement In order to climb the known rocks, you need to jump A or D, depending on the location of the rock.  
The game is interesting, I will release updates about once every 2 months.
